captions.text:
• From allergies of semen to not noticing
the plane about to make a crash landing on

your face, we count 15 times people have died
in the most embarrassing ways

15 - Horse Intercourse,
• In Washington State, it's perfectly legal

to have sex with animals and people regularly
do, but two guys decided to break into a barn

and have sex with a horse
• Hours afterwards, one of the guys complained

of stomach pain and was taken to a hospital
only to get pronounced dead - the cause? perforation

of the colon from butt-sex with a horse
• And the crazy thing is: the other guy

only received a $300 fine and one year suspension
- not even a few years later he was caught

having sex with a Shetland pony
14 - Playing Video Games,

• South Korea, a 28-year-old guy has a 50
hour Starcraft marathon at a local internet

cafe in the city of Taegu, only to drop dead
on the spot

• During his 50 hours he hadn't slept or
eaten much of anything, only pausing to go

to the toilet or have a short powernap
• The cause of death turned out to be heart

failure stemming from exhaustion - and he
also got fired from his job because he never

turned up since he, y'know, died
13 - Motorcyclist Dies During Anti-Helmet

Rally,
• A 55-year-old motorcyclist riding for

over 30 years riding in the 30 mile rally
from Syracuse to Lake Como in New York in

protest of Anti-Helmet Laws
• He then promptly died when his bike went

out of control and he landed on his head,
suffering brain injury and death

• Though the rally isn't in protest of helmets
altogether, their cause is to get rid of the

law and allow people to choose to wear helmets
of their own free will - and this guy died

because he chose WRONG
12 - Heart Attack From Cremation Letter,

• Pure irony: an old man receives a bogus
receipt in the mail ordering him to pay for

his own cremation service - which took place
a week earlier

• In the ultimate twist of fate, the man
was so shocked by this receipt that he had

a heart attack and died
• His body was even shipped off the exact

crematorium that the receipt was for, and
given the same serial number as the one from

his receipt
11 - Neck Pain Hanging,

• A guy with a wife that had a sore neck,
refused to take her to a doctor or chiropractor

and instead decided to fix her neck himself
• But he didn't do it with his hands, oh

no, he built a wood and rope device that operated
very similar to a noose

• He didn't want his wife to get hurt, so
he tested it on himself first - and wouldn't

you know it? It hanged him and he died
10 - Drowning From Kissing a Lake,

• A story from the middle ages about a Chinese
Poet Li Bai who, if legend would have us believe,

tried to either kiss or embrace the moon's
reflection in the water when he fell in and

drowned himself
• Since then this story has become a common

tale in Chinese culture, a warning not to
dunk your goddamn face in a lake and try to

drink the moon because you won't be around
for breakfast the next morning

9 - Wii Contest,
• Whoever came up with the name Wii for

Nintendo's video game console was either a
marketing genius or an idiot

• In one competition back in 2007, a 28-year-old
woman was given half-pints of water every

15 minutes with the winner the person who
can hold their bladder the longest

• She came second in the competition, but
6 hours later she was found dead from acute

water intoxication - 10 employees in the competition
were fired and people were told never to enter

a competition to do with drinking water or
holding your bladder

8 - Too Much Pudding,
• 1771, a Swedish King Adolf Frederick sat

down to eat a large luxurious meal of lobster,
champagne and caviar

• But it was his desert that ended his life
- 14 bowls of a creme-filled pastry served

in hot milk, bowl after bowl down his throat
until his digestive system gave up and he

died
• His legacy would turn from, legendary

king to what kids refer to as: that guy who
ate himself to death

7 - Allergic to Dog Semen,
• A 43-year-old mother of three decides

to join an internet bestiality chatroom, and
in so doing he meets a man with a German Shepherd

• They meet up and she allows the dog to
have sex with her, even ejaculate inside her

- only to discover too late that she's actually
allergic to dog semen

• It quickly spread through her immune system
and she went into anaphylactic shock, then

died - not a story the kids want to see carved
into her tombstone

6 - Highway Sex,
• A Brazilian couple who simply couldn't

wait to get back home to do the dirty - they
pulled over in one of the busiest Brazilian

highway, covered in fog at 6am and had sex
• Unfortunately, most drivers can't exactly

see when lighting is dim and fog abundant
- a cargo truck swerved in their direction

and hit them in the middle of intercourse
• They hadn't parked on the curb or at a

gas station you might think, no, they were
parked in the right hand lane of traffic when

they decided to whip out their junk
5 - Death From Above,

• Two kids were bored in their apartment
building one day, unsupervised, so they decided

to have a bit of fun - by dropping furniture
from the 27th floor onto pedestrians far below

• First they started with small things like
fruit, but after a while they started throwing

out huge things like chairs and a television
• When asked later, they replied that all

they were doing was trying to squish the ant-looking
things on the footpath below

4 - Testing Window Strength,
• A Canadian Lawyer named Garry Hoy, so

determined to prove his 24th-floor storey
windows were unbreakable that he slammed his

body into the glass at top speed
• Though he survived the first attempt,

once again he took another leap to reiterate
his point, only for the window to give way

and Garry to fall to his death
• The window hadn't shattered though - it

had simply popped out of its frame and fallen,
proving Garry's point but not in the most

ideal way
3 - Viagra Overdose,

• Taking just one viagra has some pretty
serious side-effects, but a whole bottle is

insane - one 28-year-old guy was dared by
two girls to have sex with them all day for

$3000
• He accepted, thinking it might be a good

idea to go with multiple Viagra instead of
just one, so he downed the bottle and actually

won the bet
• On the downside though, his heart beat

too fast and 12 hours later he was dead from
a heart attack - but it's a hell of a way

to go
2 - Music Too Loud,

• One guy walking along the beach, ironically
enough wearing a red shirt, struck down when

an entire aeroplane smashed into his face
when it tried to make an emergency landing

• The red shirt guy had obviously been listening
to music and didn't notice the ungodly roar

of a plane's engine blaring down behind him
• The strange thing is though, you'd think

the pilot would've noticed the only person
standing in that spot and landed, y'know,

anywhere else
1 - Shit on by Elephant

• This one zookeeper just wanted to help
his elephant get over some digestive problems

- so he fed it some laxatives and waited for
nature to take its course

• He waited just a little bit too close
to the elephants ass though since it unleashed

brown justice all over the zookeeper's face
- so forceful was the intestinal avalanche

that it literally buried the zookeeper in
shit

• 120 kilos of feces later, the zookeeper
was dead and the elephant relieved that it
was all over
